name: CLARITY_HIP
description: In Basket Registries store information to determine the recipients who can display and handle specific types of messages. This table contains the basic information about these Registries. Registries are stored in the HIP master file.

columns.name: REGISTRY_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.
